description:
Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der neue Samurai der Meere – Der Sohn des berüchtigten Whitebeard
El nuevo Guerrero del Mar. Aparece el hijo del legendario Barbablanca
Le nouveau Shichibukai. Le fils légendaire de Barbe Blanche apparaît
Shin Shichi Bukai: Densetsu Shirohige no Musuko Toujou
The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard`s Son Appears!
Un nuovo membro per la Flotta dei Sette - Il figlio di Barbabianca
Новый Шичибукай! Появление сына легендарного Белоуса!
الشّيتشيبوكاي الجديد، ظهور ابن اللّحية البيضاء الأسطوريّ
新七武海 伝説・白ひげの息子登場
